verses.name: Genesis 10:12
verses.text: And Resen between Nineveh and Calah: the same is a great city.

verses.name: Genesis 10:13
verses.text: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,

verses.name: Genesis 10:14
verses.text: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (out of whom came Philistim,) and Caphtorim.

verses.name: Genesis 10:15
verses.text: And Canaan begat Sidon his firstborn, and Heth,

verses.name: Genesis 10:16
verses.text: And the Jebusite, and the Amorite, and the Girgasite,

verses.name: Genesis 10:17
verses.text: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,

verses.name: Genesis 10:18
verses.text: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite: and afterward were the families of the Canaanites spread abroad.
